column4: It is normally standard in the "internet" section.  If not, just search for "remote desktop" in add/remove progs.

: Sweet Thanks, I am going to try this tonight. I would love to be able t owork on my Ubuntu machine from home.  You good with drivers? My video card driver only gives my monitor max resolution of 1024x768 yet its native resolution is 1440x900
The app in ubuntu is for connecting to Windows machines via RDP.  If you want to connect from Windows -> ubuntu, you need to set up the VNC server.
: have you fooled around with FreeNX yet?
First I have heard of it.
yeah, the onboard sound from most big vendors are pretty well supported.
